SELECT i.*, r.NAME road_name, c. time_period FROM inspector_road ir INNER JOIN inspector i ON ir.inspector_id = i.id INNER JOIN road r ON ir.road_id = r.id INNER JOIN charge c on i.charge_id = c.id
AND r.name LIKE CONCAT(#{inspectorDTO.roadName}, '%')
AND i.name LIKE CONCAT(#{inspectorDTO.name}, '%')
AND i.phone LIKE CONCAT(#{inspectorDTO.phone}, '%')
